trans-unit.source: Provides enumeration support for <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects.
A font family is a set of fonts that have the same typeface, such as Arial, but that differ in features.
These feature differences include <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Style%2A>, such as italic, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Weight%2A>, such as bold.
![Fonts](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "Fonts") Example of typefaces that are "Times New Roman" font family members
Returns the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects from a string value that represents the location of the fonts.
The location that contains the fonts.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in location.
The location is .
You cannot pass <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, because this parameter is treated as a path or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value that represents the location of the fonts.
The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in baseUri.
Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects using a base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value to resolve the font location.
The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
The location that contains the fonts.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects that represent the fonts in the resolved font location.
Returns the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects from a string value that represents the font directory location.
The location that contains the fonts.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in location.
The location is .
You cannot pass <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, because this parameter is treated as a path or [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects from a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value that represents the font location.
The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of objects that represent the fonts in baseUri.
Returns a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects using a base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value to resolve the font location.
The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
The location that contains the fonts.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects that represent the fonts in the resolved font location.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects from the default system font location.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontFamily"></xref> objects that represent the fonts in the system fonts collection.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects from the default system font location.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Typeface"></xref> objects that represent the fonts in the system fonts collection.
